Title: Step by Step
Writer: Grand Corps Malade (screenplay), Fadette Drouard (screenplay), Grand Corps Malade (book)
Actors: Pablo Pauly, Soufiane Guerrab, Moussa Mansaly, Nailia Harzoune
Plot: Patients is the story of a rebirth, a chaotic journey of victories and defeats, tears and bursts of laughter, but above all encounters: we do not heal alone.
